root.name: Nightmares From The Deep: The Cursed Heart
root.description: OverviewNightmares From The Deep: The Cursed Heart is a hidden objects game developed by Viva Media and published by Big Fish Games for the PC and Mac platforms.PlotIn Nightmares From The Deep: The Cursed Heart the player takes the role of an owner of a museum who is trying to save his daughter from the undead pirate that captured her. The undead pirate wants to take the daughter and sacrifice her in order to resurrect his long lost love.GameplayNightmares From The Deep: The Cursed Heart has two main gameplay mechanics. The first type of play is a static screen which has a list of objects that the player must find and click on. The other type of play is using items collected to solve point and click puzzles.
